results.deck: Only the deadliest of catches can be found in Sea of Chaos.
results.name: Deadliest Catch: Sea of Chaos

results.deck: Based on the movie based on the comic book character, Thor lets you step into the shoes of the titular god of thunder in order to use his mighty hammer Mjolnir against the forces of evil, led by Thor's stepbrother, the evil Loki.
results.name: Thor: God of Thunder

results.deck: An open-world horror game following eccentric FBI Agent Francis York Morgan (and his imaginary friend, Zach) as he investigates a brutal murder in the small town of Greenvale.
results.name: Deadly Premonition

results.deck: This updated Cave shooter was released on the Xbox 360 in Japan on November 26, 2009. The game is region free and can be played by owners of non-Japanese Xbox 360 consoles.
results.name: Mushihime-sama Futari

results.deck: A visual novel and turn-based strategy hybrid originally released for the PC and later ported to the PSP and Xbox 360.
results.name: Akatsuki no Amaneka to Aoi Kyojin: Pashiate Bunmei Kenkyuukai Koubouki

results.deck: Disney released a new game to go along with the 2010 film release, Tron Legacy. This game is a prequel to the movie forming a bridge (but not a Jeff bridge) between the original and the 2010 film.
results.name: Tron: Evolution

results.deck: The Mercenaries series was set to continue with an online-focused third title, but Pandemic Studios was closed in November 2009. Electronic Arts claimed to continue working on the franchise, but nothing has been heard about the game since.
results.name: Mercs Inc.

results.deck: Ubisoft returns to the Sands of Time universe for a fourth time in this May 2010 release, set in between the first two games in the trilogy and coinciding with the release of the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time movie.
results.name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands

results.deck: Step into the boots of Tier 1 Operatives Rabbit and Deuce in this modern take on EA's long-running Medal of Honor series; the game features separately-developed single player and multiplayer modes.
results.name: Medal of Honor

results.deck: The third entry in the anime girl-focused fighting game series, released in Japanese arcades with a home version for PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Arcana Heart 3

results.deck: UFC Undisputed 2010 is the second installment of the UFC Undisputed franchise.
results.name: UFC Undisputed 2010

results.deck: The Xbox Live Arcade versions of Castlevania: Symphony of the Night, Super Contra, and Frogger are included on this disc-based compilation.
results.name: Konami Classics Vol. 1

results.deck: The Xbox Live Arcade versions of Contra, Track & Field, and Rush N Attack are included on this disc-based compilation.
results.name: Konami Classics Volume 2

results.deck: A depiction of the beginning of the infamous war between the noble Autobots and the nefarious Decepticons, set on the Transformers' homeworld, Cybertron, long before they had even heard of humans or the planet Earth.
results.name: Transformers: War For Cybertron

results.deck: Following the events of the first game, Darth Vader clones a replacement Starkiller, who again rebels against his master.
results.name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II

results.deck: Green Day: Rock Band is Harmonix's second installment in their flagship series' band-centric spin-off, and exclusively features the work of the highly-popular punk-rock group Green Day.
results.name: Green Day: Rock Band

results.deck: Originally known as "Black Lotus", and then "True Crime: Hong Kong", Sleeping Dogs is an open-world action game that tells the story of undercover cop Wei Shen as he infiltrates the ranks of the murderous Triads in Hong Kong.
results.name: Sleeping Dogs

results.deck: When Gotham City's slums have been transformed into a secluded super-prison, it's up to Batman to uncover its conspiracy in the sequel to 2009's Batman: Arkham Asylum.
results.name: Batman: Arkham City

results.deck: Spec Ops: The Line is a narrative-driven modern military third-person shooter set in Dubai during the aftermath of a series of destructive sandstorms.
results.name: Spec Ops: The Line

results.deck: Game based on the movie by the same name in which dragons are slain mercilessly by a Viking tribe.
results.name: How to Train Your Dragon

results.deck: Naughty Bear is a third-person action game about a psychotic teddy bear that preys on the innocent inhabitants of an island because he was not invited to a birthday party.
results.name: Naughty Bear

results.deck: Bass Pro Shops: The Hunt
results.name: Bass Pro Shops: The Hunt

results.deck: Return to the roots of arcade NBA basketball in the 2010 installment of NBA Jam. Developed by EA Canada for seventh-generation game consoles, this rebirth brings back the gameplay, aesthetics, and gratuitous secrets of the original 1993 arcade game.
results.name: NBA Jam

results.deck: Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening is a full retail expansion pack for Dragon Age: Origins.
results.name: Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening

results.deck: Originally announced as a Wii exclusive, this game by Majesco in which players are plunged in 6 distinct 3D "films" also came to the Xbox 360. There are 4 pairs of 3D glasses within the game box.
results.name: Attack of the Movies 3D

results.deck: World of Outlaws: Sprint Cars
results.name: World of Outlaws: Sprint Cars

results.deck: The latest game in the Black Bean racing series, developed in cooperation with professional racing driver, Gianni Morbidelli.
results.name: Superstars V8 Next Challenge

results.deck: This year's Madden is the 22nd in the annual installment and features the slogan "Simpler, Quicker, Deeper".
results.name: Madden NFL 11

results.deck: The reboot to the Armored Core franchise, Armored Core V takes place in the wake of a global catastrophe where humanity fights over world resources.
results.name: Armored Core V

results.deck: An upcoming top down shooter
results.name: Eclosion

results.deck: DJ Hero 2 adds freestyle scratching and crossfading, as well as scored vocal gameplay to the mix in this DJ-ing rhythm game.
results.name: DJ Hero 2

results.deck: Strike Force Red Cell is an upcoming FPS with missions based on actually terrorist events
results.name: Strike Force Red Cell

results.deck: A horizontal shoot 'em up.
results.name: Strike Witches: Hakugin no Tsubasa

results.deck: Field & Stream is a budget hunting title for Xbox 360, released in June 2010.
results.name: Field & Stream: Total Outdoorsman Challenge

results.deck: An upcoming racing game from Edge
results.name: Racers

results.deck: The 2010 entry in EA's pro golf sim.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11

results.deck: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa is the latest in EA Sports' FIFA World Cup series and it not only improves on 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany, but also adds some key elements popularized by FIFA 10 and UEFA EURO 2008
results.name: 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa

results.deck: Project T is a MMO currently being developed by Korean developer Blueside. The game is currently under development for both PC and Xbox 360.
results.name: Project T

results.deck: Take the fight to evil Russian robots using a rocket-powered self-adapting battlesuit in this innovative third-person shooter from Resident Evil creator Shinji Mikami.
results.name: Vanquish

results.deck: When Earth begins to fall in an ancient cycle of destruction, Commander Shepard must unite the forces of the galaxy to stop the Reapers in the infamous final chapter of the first Mass Effect trilogy.
results.name: Mass Effect 3

results.deck: Developed by Milestone, this is the latest officially licensed World Superbike Championship game.
results.name: SBK X: Superbike World Championship

results.deck: This sequel to the colorful "splatformer", de Blob 2 takes all the color from the titular hero's home city AGAIN and requires him to save it. It also introduces a host of new features.
results.name: de Blob 2

results.deck: Players return to the post-Apocalypse in the sequel to 2010's Darksiders, this time as former protagonist War's fellow Horseman of the Apocalypse, Death, the pale rider, who seeks to resurrect Humanity to clear his brother's good name.
results.name: Darksiders II

results.deck: MLB 2K10 is 2K Sports latest Major League Baseball game. Evan Longoria is the featured cover athlete.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K10

results.deck: The latest in the series of Traveler's Tales' LEGO games brings Star Wars: The Clone Wars into the fold. New features include: a new pseudo-RTS gameplay mode, improved animations and lighting, and more direct in-game model assembly.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars

results.deck: The 19th annual release of EA's successful NHL franchise introduces a Canadian Hockey League license and a new real-time physics engine.
results.name: NHL 11

results.deck: No Fate! Only the Power of Will is a visual novel developed by Alchemist.
results.name: No Fate! -only the power of will-

results.deck: An updated Cave shooter released on the Xbox 360 in Japan on February 25th, 2010. This title is the second region-free Cave release on the Xbox 360.
results.name: Espgaluda II Black Label

results.deck: EA's upcoming college pigskin game will feature new locomotion player movements, new equipment, formation subs, and more. Former University of Florida quarterback and Heisman Trophy Tim Tebow will grace the cover of this year's edition.
results.name: NCAA Football 11

results.deck: Rock of the Dead is an on-rails shooter in which players "shoot" enemies by 'plucking' a specific note pattern using a guitar controller peripheral.
results.name: Rock of the Dead

results.deck: The sixth core entry in Activision's Guitar Hero series represents the last entry developed by Neversoft.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock

results.deck: The 3rd in the Lips Franchise, this time focusing on well known party hits from the past 40 years including I Will Survive, YMCA and Its Not Unusual.
results.name: Lips: Party Classics

results.deck: Players take control of Buzz, Woody, and Jessie as they explore the world of Toy Story and much more.
results.name: Toy Story 3: The Video Game

results.deck: Stylish, ludicrous kills net big points in this ridiculously over-the-top first-person shooter.
results.name: Bulletstorm

results.deck: The newest game in the long-running KOF series. The Ash Saga comes to a close as more than 30 characters face off against each other in 3-on-3 combat.
results.name: The King of Fighters XIII

results.deck: Shoot 1UP is a unique shoot 'em up game created by Mommy's Best Games in which players control all of their ships at the same time.
results.name: Shoot 1UP

results.deck: A skateboarding game starring Shaun White by Ubisoft Montreal. Brought to you by Stride gum!
results.name: Shaun White Skateboarding

results.deck: A PS3/Xbox 360 entry in Koei's long-running Nobunaga's Ambition strategy game series.
results.name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Tendou

results.deck: Ubisoft's soccer-sim for the Xbox 360, PS3, and PC.
results.name: Pure Futbol

results.deck: Described as "Gun-porn 2.0," Bodycount is Codemasters Studios Guildford's arcade style first-person shooter for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
results.name: Bodycount

results.deck: Play a guitar controller with real strings in this rhythm game from Seven45 Studios.
results.name: PowerGig: Rise of the SixString

results.deck: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning is an open-world singleplayer RPG with combo-based action and the trappings of an MMORPG. Reckoning is set in Amalur, the same setting as 38 Studios' planned MMO codenamed "Copernicus."
results.name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning

results.deck: 4th installment in the Lips series with tracks from Duran Duran, Pat Benatar, Huey Lewis and the News and Devo.
results.name: Lips: I Love the 80's

results.deck: The second installment in the EA Sports Active franchise, and the first to be released on platforms other than the Wii.
results.name: EA Sports Active 2.0

results.deck: A little boy seeks to rescue his lost sister from a dreary, dangerous world in this puzzle-platformer that kicked off the Summer of Arcade in 2010.
results.name: Limbo

results.deck: Dirt 3 is the latest installment in Codemasters' long-running Colin McRae Rally franchise. The game returns to the series' rally roots with dynamic weather, a career focusing on team-based racing, as well as introducing the freestyle event: Gymkhana.
results.name: DiRT 3

results.deck: Two mercenaries, E'lara and Caddoc, go in search of an artifact that Caddoc had a vision about that could save humanity or threaten its survival.
results.name: Hunted: The Demon's Forge

results.deck: Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions revolves around the pieces of a magical tablet, spanning four distinct dimensions and starring the Spider-Men therein.
results.name: Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions

results.deck: A hack-and-slash action-RPG featuring cooperative multiplayer developed by Snowblind Studios under the Lord of the Rings license. The game draws on both literary and movie influences to tell the story of three warriors fighting in the North of Middle Earth concurrently with the events of the books/movies.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

results.deck: The second in the Moe Moe World War II offshoot of the Daisenryaku series of strategy games, where WWII is reimagined with anime girl-based units.
results.name: Moe Moe 2-ji Daisenryaku 2 [chu]

results.deck: A procedurally-generated game of world exploration, resource harvesting, and freeform construction. It supports local and online multiplayer, and is regularly updated with new content and features.
results.name: Minecraft

results.deck: Developed by Day 1 Studios, F.3.A.R. (pronounced "Fear Three") is the final chapter in the F.E.A.R. franchise and continues the twisted story of Alma Wade and her two sons, Paxton Fettel and the Point Man.
results.name: F.E.A.R. 3

results.deck: A game based on the Sin City series of comics has been in development for several years, said to run on Epic's Unreal Engine 3.
results.name: Sin City

results.deck: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2 is a fighting game based on the popular anime and manga series, Naruto.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2

results.deck: The visual novel series returns with Love Chu Chu.
results.name: Chaos;Head Love Chu Chu!

results.deck: Sniper: Ghost Warrior is a military simulation game developed by CITY-interactive with focus on sniper activities like spotting enemies and honing sniper skills, including a 12 player multiplayer mode.
results.name: Sniper: Ghost Warrior

results.deck: World of Tanks is a free-to-play (F2P) massively multiplayer online (MMO) team based action game featuring WWII era tank combat.
results.name: World of Tanks

results.deck: Quiz about on wildlife using National Geographic content.
results.name: Nat Geo Quiz! Wild Life

results.deck: Winning Post World 2010 is a horse racing simulation game developed by Koei. It is a part of the long running Winning Post series and was released in Japan on February 26, 2010.
results.name: Winning Post World 2010

results.deck: The third and final installment in the Marcus Fenix trilogy. Taking place on the apocalyptic planet Sera, 18 months after the ending of Gears of War 2, players will once again take control of C.O.G. soldier Marcus Fenix as he takes on the Locust threat and their Lambent rivals.
results.name: Gears of War 3

results.deck: The 2010 cricket game from Codemasters, licensed by the ECB, Cricket Australia and the MCC; International Cricket 2010 is the second cricket game to be released by Codemasters for the Playstation 3 and Xbox 360, following Ashes Cricket 2009.
results.name: International Cricket 2010

results.deck: Rather than being based on the SAW II movie, Flesh & Blood, like the first SAW videogame, is an original story set in the SAW universe.
results.name: SAW II: Flesh & Blood

results.deck: A lucha libre wrestling game sponsored by AAA, one of the larger pro wrestling organizations in Mexico.
results.name: Lucha Libre AAA Heroes del Ring

results.deck: From the publishers of ARMA, Naval Assault: The Killing Tide is an Xbox 360 exclusive submarine simulator created by Artech Studios.
results.name: Naval Assault: The Killing Tide

results.deck: The eighth game in the esteemed survival-horror franchise sees convict Murphy Pendleton escape captivity and flee into the much greater danger of the cursed town of Silent Hill.
results.name: Silent Hill: Downpour

results.deck: Owl-based action adventure game for Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, Wii and DS. It looks like a hoot! GET IT!?
results.name: The Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole

results.deck: Syndicate is a reinvention of the 1993 game by Bullfrog. Developed at Starbreeze Studios, the game puts players in the shoes of Miles Kilo, one of the cybernetically-enhanced Agents who wages war against enemy mega-corporations on behalf of EuroCorp, his sponsor syndicate.
results.name: Syndicate

results.deck: Salvation is a third person shooter in development by Black Wing Foundation and N-Game studios.
results.name: Salvation

results.deck: A third-person, squad-based, tactical game that recounts humanity's first contact with aliens during the Cold War in the 1960s, and the subsequent founding of the XCOM organization.
results.name: The Bureau: XCOM Declassified

results.deck: A family-friendly baseball game in the long-running Backyard Sports franchise.
results.name: Backyard Sports: Sandlot Sluggers

results.deck: A Retro-Action-RPG for the Xbox 360, starring Gaia Cross a paladin from the Kingdom of Meridia
results.name: Final Saga

results.deck: An upcoming SHMUP published by 505 Games.
results.name: Tides of War

results.deck: A Shrek game based on the final Shrek film of the same name.
results.name: Shrek Forever After

results.deck: After a decade-long hiatus, Marvel vs. Capcom 3 continues the popular crossover fighting game series characterized by fast-paced gameplay, complex tag teams, and elaborate combos.
results.name: Marvel vs. Capcom 3: Fate of Two Worlds

results.deck: Tony Hawk: SHRED is the successor to Tony Hawk: RIDE, a peripheral-based, motion-controlled skateboarding game. SHRED introduces a snowboarding mode to the series, as well as Xbox 360 Avatar support.
results.name: Tony Hawk: SHRED

results.deck: ATVs and MX Bikes engage top speeds through branching off-road tracks in this outlandish arcade racer.
results.name: Nail'd

results.deck: Ravensdale is an upcoming fantasy action game developed by Spellbound Entertainment.
results.name: Ravensdale

results.deck: This sequel to Dragon Age: Origins features faster combat, a new art style, and a brand new, fully voiced main character named Hawke.
results.name: Dragon Age II

results.deck: An updated version of Ketsui: Kizuna Jugoku Tachi released on April 22, 2010 for Xbox 360. A PS3 version was later released in 2013.
results.name: Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi Extra

results.deck: The third installment in the Assassin's Creed franchise, this game's story picks up right after the events of Assassin's Creed II, showing Ezio Auditore traveling to Rome to recruit a new force of assassins. Brotherhood is the first game in the series to offer online multiplayer.
results.name: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood
